thread.title: Scholar Athlete of the Week: New Haven's Hadley Decker
thread.title_full: Scholar Athlete of the Week: New Haven's Hadley Decker

title: Scholar Athlete of the Week: New Haven's Hadley Decker
text:
Scholar Athlete of the Week: New Haven's Hadley Decker 
By Eric Dutkiewicz - 21Alive October 1, 2015 Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 11:43 PM EDT 
NEW HAVEN, Ind. (21Alive) - The 21Alive/Parkview Sports Medicine Scholar Athlete of the Week for Oct. 1 is New Haven High School senior Hadley Decker. 
Decker plays volleyball and softball for the Lady Bulldogs. 
She is also a member of the student council, National Honor Society, Fellowship of Christian Athletes and Freshman Mentor Program. 
Decker earns a 11.4 grade point average on a 12-point scale. 
She will attend Anderson University next year and study exercise science. She hopes to play college softball, too. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment.
